install.packages("tidyverse")

library(tidyverse)

# Using the Titanic dataset from kaggle 
titanic <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datasciencedojo/datasets/master/titanic.csv")

summary(titanic[, c("Age", "Fare")])

table(titanic$Sex)
table(titanic$Survived)

titanic$log_fare <- log(titanic$Fare + 1)

summary(titanic$log_fare)

ggplot(titanic[!is.na(titanic$Age), ], aes(x = Age)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, fill = "steelblue", color = "black") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Age", x = "Age", y = "Count")

ggplot(titanic, aes(x = Age, y = Fare)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Scatterplot of Age vs Fare", x = "Age", y = "Fare")
